subject: UN/WB/FNG COMPENSATION COMMISS
body:
UN/WB/FNG COMPENSATION COMMISSION
OUR REF: UN-FGA/WB4/13
YOUR REF: (UN/WB/FGA)..00/14
BATCH: 70-35-671-39/188/18
Attention  Dear beneficiary Scam Compensation sum of $950.000.00
dollars approved in your name through United Nations mass assisted
project funds.This compensation involves business investment
failure,Inheritance, Contracts, Lottery,Dating, Diplomatic Payment,
loan E.T.C, the mass assisted fund was approved to settle failed
business scam extortion.Attn Scam Victim.We wish to inform you that
your scam compensation sum of $950.000.00 united states dollars
approved through United Nations mass
assisted project,we have severally tried to contact you without
success,are you willing to receive your scam compensation? You have to
respond as soon as you receive this message because we have your
compensation file submitted by UN external auditors in Switzerland but
we have not heard from you International global security watchers
reported different degrees of being a victim of scam about you, so
there is a need for you to get in touch with us right immediately you
will never have an opportunity of this kind in the nearest future so
your destiny and survival is in your hands.
Your Full Name
Your Country
Your Home Address
Your Direct Phone
Note.that the only money to pay for this transaction is the
registration fee of $25 Apple gift card or Steam wallet Card only. and
you purchase an iTunes card of $25,and send the information to us for
immediate remittance of your fund to you.Note: that every claims has
an expiring period of five working days (5 days) so you have to do
that
very urgently to avoid expiration
, call me or Text (424) 3716294
Thanks
Your sincerely
Mr James Ego
Email 
spycltd6@gmail.com

subject: Re: UN/WB/FNG COMPENSATION COMMISS
body:
Hello Mr. James Ego,

Thank you for reaching out to me and informing me about this opportunity. It's quite surprising to hear about the United Nations mass assisted project. I'm curious, could you please explain more about how this project works? 

Also, I'm interested in understanding how my name was selected for this? Was there a specific criteria or process involved?

I noticed that you mentioned something about a fee of an Apple gift card or Steam wallet Card. Could you clarify why these specific types of payment are required?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Judith
